author: Staff Reporter
text:
Now, Tangedco bills may be paid through the e-service centres operated under the Arasu Cable TV Corporation.

The bi-monthly bills payable to Tangedco will be accepted by the e-service centres on all working days between 9.45 a.m. to 2 p.m. The service charge for bills up to Rs.1,000 is Rs.10; for bill from Rs.1,001 up to Rs. 3,000, it is Rs.20; from Rs. 3,001 up to Rs. 5,000, it is Rs.30; for bill from Rs. 5,001 up to Rs.10,000, the charge is Rs.40 and for bills above Rs. 10,001, the service charge is Rs.50. There are 6 e-service centres that are functioning in the district.
title: Tangedco bill payment through e-service centres
